scripts.build: cd seo-writer-web && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd .. && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const root=process.cwd();const src=path.join(root,'seo-writer-web','dist');const dst=path.join(root,'dist');fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});const copy=(s,d)=>{for(const ent of fs.readdirSync(s,{withFileTypes:true})){const sp=path.join(s,ent.name);const dp=path.join(d,ent.name);if(ent.isDirectory()){fs.mkdirSync(dp,{recursive:true});copy(sp,dp);}else{fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp);}}};copy(src,dst);"
